    tag: ex_12345.version
    value: 1
  ex_98765.date:

docs.title: Class: DerivedEmployee
docs.text:
Description: A person employed by an organization. 
 classDiagram
    class DerivedEmployee
      Person <|-- DerivedEmployee

      DerivedEmployee : department

          DerivedEmployee --|> DepartmentCodelist : department

      DerivedEmployee : employee_id

      DerivedEmployee : employement_time

      DerivedEmployee : gender

          DerivedEmployee --|> GenderEnum : gender

      DerivedEmployee : id

      DerivedEmployee : name

docs.text:
A string encoding a JSON Path. The value of the string MUST conform to JSON Point syntax and SHOULD dereference to zero or more valid objects within the current instance document when encoded in tree form.
